event-group.description: Chases player. Higher movement speed when your score is higher.

event-group.description: Fast enemy that initially aims at the player, but doesn't change its course.

event-group.description: A big & slow enemy that just occupies space on the screen for a while before leaving.

event-group.description: Another slime that comes and eats your food before you do.
